ResourceHeader.ResourceName: OMTI Spectral Airglow Temperature Imager (SATI) at Shigaraki, Japan
ResourceHeader.Description: Optical Mesosphere Thermosphere Imagers (OMTIs) Spectral Airglow Temperature Imager (SATI) Data. The SATI measures airglow rotational temperature and airglow intensity in the mesopause region at 80-100km altitudes through the OH and O2 airglow emission lines. For more information, see http://stdb2.isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp/omti/. Digital data are available upon request to PI.
